attributes.action: Allow Mr Donald Trump Entry to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.facebook.com/ukipvideos/videos/1698557053692666/.
Police officers and public would confirm this if they were allowed too without being branded racist.
attributes.background:
Too many times have we had peoples voices shutdown, Because a few disagree with them.
What Mr Trump has stated regards to islamifacation  is somewhat close to the truth.
Police officers and general public, are more cautious or afraid to wander through certain areas of the UK.
